attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i find i wronge that workers from eu countries can claim child benifit when there children are not living in the uk
when they claim they even get it back dated surly all this money could be used in this country we pay enough tax already and to find it is being sent out of the country is a joke the rest of the world must think are a right set of mugs also most of the money earned by the above is sent to there home country i am no economist but that must put added stress on or own economy THE GOVENMENT MUST STOP THIS NOW!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
